Subskills.name: Paranormal Activity
Subskills.description: Increases the maximum amount of phantom blades.

Subskills.name: Phantom Agility
Subskills.description: Increases the attack speed of phantom blades.

Subskills.name: Spirit Blades
Subskills.description: Phantom blades now orbit you and attack the closest monsters.

Subskills.name: Dimensional Intellect
Subskills.description: Decreases the mana cost of phantom blade.

Subskills.name: Ghostly Reach
Subskills.description: Increases the attack range of phantom blades.

Subskills.name: Malicious Essence
Subskills.description: Increases the damage dealt by phantom blades.

Subskills.name: Essence of Time
Subskills.description: Increases the duration of phantom blade.

Subskills.name: Malevolent Pulse
Subskills.description: Increases the area of effect radius of phantom blades attacks.

Subskills.name: Dimensional Ghostblade
Subskills.description: Phantom blades no longer attack but throw flying scimitars with increased damage.

Subskills.name: Twice The Price
Subskills.description: Chance for phantomblades to swing an additional time on hit.

Subskills.name: Terrorized Mind
Subskills.description: When a phantom blade strikes a bleeding target the bleeding is consumed unleashing a vorpal pulse dealing increased damage based on the bleeding value.

Subskills.name: Spectral Ghostblade
Subskills.description: Phantom blades deal increased damage based on your energy.
